definition: The term "angelogen" refers to the act of intentionally providing false information or deceiving someone through spoken or written communication. It is commonly used to describe situations where someone deliberately lies or tells untruths.

examples.german: Sie hat angelogen, um sich zu sch√ºtzen.
Ich kann nicht glauben, dass er mich angelogen hat.
examples.english: I can't believe he lied to me.
